p: Other phytochemical constituents of hemp by-products include condensed tannins (CT), alkaloids, phenols, lignanamides, and tocopherols ( 35, 45). The CT are low in hempseed and HSC ( Table 4). Hemp leaves might contain higher contents of CT since the concentration of bioactive compounds in hemp plant chronologically decreases from flowers, leaves, stems, seed to the roots ( 27). However, there is no available literature on CT of hemp leaves. Turner et al. ( 55) suggested that hempseed by-products contain alkaloids and this was confirmed by Yan et al. ( 56), but their contents have not yet been determined.
